data.title: Property Tax Calculator
data.meta_description: Calculate your taxes based on your property assessment. See how your taxes are used to support services in the County.
data.text:
The calculator can provide an estimate of your:

2024 property taxes based on estimated 2024 tax rates.

Tax increases after completing a project or adding something new to your property.

To estimate Residential taxes from your Property Assessment Notice:

Select Property Type 'Residential' from the dropdown.

Enter the combined total value of your Taxable (Status T) Residential and Farmland property from the Assessed Value column on your Assessment Notice.

Click on the 'Calculate' button to generate the results.

To estimate Non-Residential taxes from your Property Assessment Notice:

Select Property Type 'Non-Residential' from the dropdown.

Enter the combined total value of your Taxable (Status T) Non-Residential property from the Assessed Value column on your Assessment Notice.

Click on the 'Calculate' button to generate the results.

Donâ€™t know your property's assessed value? Find it using the Property Assessment Tool
